chapter.title_ar: الاشتراطات الخاصة بالمباني الصناعية في مدينة أبوظبي
chapter.title_en: Special Requirements for Industrial Buildings in Abu Dhabi City

rules.title_ar: الاستخدامات والمكونات بالقسيمة الصناعية في مدينة أبوظبي
rules.title_en: Uses and components (industrial plot) in Abu Dhabi City

checks.description_en: Permitted activities are limited to industrial zones as described (primary industrial activity, secondary complementary activity).
checks.source_excerpt_ar: تقتصر الأنشطة المسموح بها في القسائم الصناعية ...

checks.description_en: Workers accommodation is not allowed in industrial plots (Abu Dhabi City).

rules.title_ar: نسبة البناء والمساحات الطابقية بالقسيمة الصناعية في مدينة أبوظبي
rules.title_en: Building coverage & floor areas (industrial plot) in Abu Dhabi City

checks.description_en: Total building coverage must not exceed 60% of the total plot area.
Secondary (complementary) activity area must not exceed 31% of the plot area.

rules.title_ar: خط البناء والارتدادات والبروزات بالقسيمة الصناعية في مدينة أبوظبي
rules.title_en: Building line, setbacks, projections (industrial plot) in Abu Dhabi City

checks.description_en: If entrances are internal (not direct), building on plot boundary may be allowed without setback (as per clause).
If there is a direct entrance from the street side, setback from plot boundary must be at least 5 meters (as extracted).
For the side facing an adjacent plot, setback is 2.01 m for all building types.
If any plot side length exceeds 41.11 m, a vehicle lane of at least 4.01 m width is required for civil defense access.
When creating separate buildings inside the plot, minimum distance between buildings must be 2.0 m.

rules.title_ar: عدد الطوابق والارتفاعات والمناسيب بالقسيمة الصناعية في مدينة أبوظبي
rules.title_en: Floors, heights, levels (industrial plot) in Abu Dhabi City

checks.description_en: Final ground floor level for workshops/offices/shops must be at least 1.40 m above the midline of the opposite road level.
Primary use: maximum building height is 81.11 m (as extracted), measured from final workshop floor level to highest point.
Primary use: mezzanine floor allowed up to 01% of ground floor area (as extracted) for admin/control offices or storage.
If mezzanine exists for primary use, stair must be accessed from inside the shed (as extracted).
Secondary use: ground + first floor allowed. Ground floor height up to 6.11 m; no 'sadda' allowed. First floor (offices) height up to 3.11 m.
Mezzanine is prohibited in commercial shops (as extracted).
Roof service covering must follow Abu Dhabi Urban Planning Council roof services guideline (reference rule).
Basement inside plot allowed only for pump rooms and water tanks; minimum clear internal height 2.11 m; setback from plot boundary not less than 8.11 m (as extracted).
Basement top level must match the sidewalk level opposite the entrance (as extracted).
Basement pump/tank room sizes and locations require approvals from relevant authorities (as extracted).
Electrical room permitted if its height does not exceed 4.11 m from road axis level (as extracted).

rules.title_ar: السلالم والدرج بالقسيمة الصناعية في مدينة أبوظبي
rules.title_en: Stairs (industrial plot) in Abu Dhabi City

checks.description_en: Stairs requirements refer to Article 41 of the guide (apply requirements of that article).

rules.title_ar: مساحات العناصر والأبعاد الداخلية بالقسيمة الصناعية في مدينة أبوظبي
rules.title_en: Internal element areas & minimum dimensions (industrial plot) in Abu Dhabi City

checks.description_en: Ground floor (shops/offices building): minimum smallest side is 4.11 m.
Ground floor (shops/offices building): minimum area is 41 m2 (as extracted).
Preparation kitchen allowed: minimum smallest side 8.01 m; maximum area 4 m2 (as extracted).
Attached office/store allowed: minimum smallest side 3.11 m (as extracted).
First floor (shops/offices building): offices minimum smallest side 3.11 m; minimum area 0m2 (as extracted text shows 0m2).
Sheds/warehouses/workshops: minimum smallest side 6.11 m; minimum area 21 m2 (as extracted).
Inside shed: one office + one bathroom allowed; office min smallest side 3.11 m; bathroom min smallest side 3.11 m; bathroom min area 6 m2 (as extracted).

rules.title_ar: التهوية والإنارة الداخلية بالقسيمة الصناعية في مدينة أبوظبي
rules.title_en: Ventilation & internal lighting (industrial plot) in Abu Dhabi City

checks.description_en: Mechanical ventilation is permitted only after submitting an undertaking by owner/consultant to provide and maintain systems per Abu Dhabi International codes (as extracted).

rules.title_ar: الأسوار بالقسيمة الصناعية في مدينة أبوظبي
rules.title_en: Fences (industrial plot) in Abu Dhabi City

checks.description_en: Fence on plot boundary must be min 2.11 m and max 2.01 m (as extracted).
Fences between buildings inside the plot are not permitted (as extracted).
Street-facing fences may be transparent steel structure, with solid portion not less than 8.11 m from road midline (as extracted).

rules.title_ar: مواقف السيارات بالقسائم التجارية في مدينة أبوظبي
rules.title_en: Parking (commercial plots) in Abu Dhabi City

checks.description_en: Article 060 exists in Chapter 10 index, but its clause text was not extractable from the available parsed pages. Add manually once you provide the article page screenshot or text.

rules.title_ar: مداخل السيارات بالقسيمة الصناعية في مدينة أبوظبي
rules.title_en: Vehicle entrances (industrial plot) in Abu Dhabi City

checks.description_en: Minimum number of vehicle entrances is 2 (as extracted).
Vehicle entrance width must be between 4.01 m and 6.11 m (as extracted).
Entrance locations and design are subject to traffic study and municipality requirements (as extracted).
Distance between entrances must be >= 80.11 m if plot area > 8111 m2; and >= 31.11 m if plot area <= 8111 m2 (as extracted).
Article 062 exists in the target range, but its clause text/rules are not provided yet. Add once available.

extraction_warnings: Some numeric values appear with OCR/encoding artifacts (e.g., 4.11m, 81.11m). Kept as-is from extracted text.
Article 060 text not extracted; provided as placeholder.
